main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright object in the sky changing colors in Hazelwood, Missouri on 29 November 1968.
interesting points: The observer described the object as changing colors from white to green to red and back to white., The sighting lasted approximately 5-10 minutes., The object's course was considered conflicting; it appeared similar to a star or planet., The object was seen in ground-visual conditions, with no physical evidence left behind., There were no photographs or other physical evidence submitted with the report.
witness description: The report was filled out by a civilian witness.
